mean_cn: n. 纸巾，餐巾，（小孩用的）尿布
mean_en: a piece of cloth or paper used at meals for protecting your clothes and cleaning your lips and fingers; a piece of soft cloth or other thick material that is folded around a baby’s bottom and between its legs to absorb and hold its body waste
sentence: You have something on your face. Here, take this napkin and wipe it off.
sentence_trans: 哎呀，你脸上沾了东西。来来来，快拿纸巾擦擦。
word_etyma: nap桌布 + kin表名词，小 → 餐巾
